property.name: text
property.value: Type in your machine's IP address for hostInterface

property.name: text
property.value:
The above creates a web socket server on localhost that supplies data from TestSpontaneous.
The web page defined here can access that data feed: /accessors/web/hosts/browser/demo/WebSocketLog/WebSocketLog.html
The above web page assumes that accessor server is running on your local machine. On your machine, start the accessor testServer. See accessors/web/hosts/browser/test/README.
Run this model.
Point a browser to: http://localhost:8089/hosts/browser/demo/WebSocketLog/WebSocketLog.html
It would probably also work on terra. Terra adds other stuff to the web page (e.g. header bar, menu bar). Not sure how to avoid that?

property.name: script
note
property.value: NOTE: To see the script, invoke Open Actor

property.name: script
note
property.value: NOTE: To see the script, invoke Open Actor
